skills.name: 1password
skills.description: description: Set up and use 1Password CLI (op). Use when installing the CLI, enabling desktop app integration, signing in (single or multi-account), or reading/injecting/running secrets via op.

skills.name: apple-notes
skills.description: description: Manage Apple Notes via the `memo` CLI on macOS (create, view, edit, delete, search, move, and export notes). Use when a user asks OpenClaw to add a note, list notes, search notes, or manage note folders.

skills.name: apple-reminders
skills.description: name: apple-reminders

skills.name: bear-notes
skills.description: description: Create, search, and manage Bear notes via grizzly CLI.

skills.name: blogwatcher
skills.description: description: Monitor blogs and RSS/Atom feeds for updates using the blogwatcher CLI.

skills.name: blucli
skills.description: description: BluOS CLI (blu) for discovery, playback, grouping, and volume.

skills.name: bluebubbles
skills.description: description: Use when you need to send or manage iMessages via BlueBubbles (recommended iMessage integration). Calls go through the generic message tool with channel="bluebubbles".

skills.name: camsnap
skills.description: description: Capture frames or clips from RTSP/ONVIF cameras.

skills.name: canvas
skills.description: Display HTML content on connected OpenClaw nodes (Mac app, iOS, Android).

skills.name: clawhub
skills.description: description: Use the ClawHub CLI to search, install, update, and publish agent skills from clawhub.com. Use when you need to fetch new skills on the fly, sync installed skills to latest or a specific version, or publish new/updated skill folders with the npm-installed clawhub CLI.

skills.name: coding-agent
skills.description: description: Run Codex CLI, Claude Code, OpenCode, or Pi Coding Agent via background process for programmatic control.

skills.name: discord
skills.description: description: Use when you need to control Discord from OpenClaw via the discord tool: send messages, react, post or upload stickers, upload emojis, run polls, manage threads/pins/search, create/edit/delete channels and categories, fetch permissions or member/role/channel info, set bot presence/activity, or handle moderation actions in Discord DMs or channels.

skills.name: eightctl
skills.description: description: Control Eight Sleep pods (status, temperature, alarms, schedules).

skills.name: food-order
skills.description: description: Reorder Foodora orders + track ETA/status with ordercli. Never confirm without explicit user approval. Triggers: order food, reorder, track ETA.

skills.name: gemini
skills.description: description: Gemini CLI for one-shot Q&A, summaries, and generation.

skills.name: gifgrep
skills.description: description: Search GIF providers with CLI/TUI, download results, and extract stills/sheets.

skills.name: github
skills.description: description: "Interact with GitHub using the `gh` CLI. Use `gh issue`, `gh pr`, `gh run`, and `gh api` for issues, PRs, CI runs, and advanced queries."

skills.name: gog
skills.description: description: Google Workspace CLI for Gmail, Calendar, Drive, Contacts, Sheets, and Docs.

skills.name: goplaces
skills.description: description: Query Google Places API (New) via the goplaces CLI for text search, place details, resolve, and reviews. Use for human-friendly place lookup or JSON output for scripts.

skills.name: healthcheck
skills.description: description: Host security hardening and risk-tolerance configuration for OpenClaw deployments. Use when a user asks for security audits, firewall/SSH/update hardening, risk posture, exposure review, OpenClaw cron scheduling for periodic checks, or version status checks on a machine running OpenClaw (laptop, workstation, Pi, VPS).

skills.name: himalaya
skills.description: description: "CLI to manage emails via IMAP/SMTP. Use `himalaya` to list, read, write, reply, forward, search, and organize emails from the terminal. Supports multiple accounts and message composition with MML (MIME Meta Language)."

skills.name: imsg
skills.description: description: iMessage/SMS CLI for listing chats, history, watch, and sending.

skills.name: local-places
skills.description: description: Search for places (restaurants, cafes, etc.) via Google Places API proxy on localhost.

skills.name: mcporter
skills.description: description: Use the mcporter CLI to list, configure, auth, and call MCP servers/tools directly (HTTP or stdio), including ad-hoc servers, config edits, and CLI/type generation.

skills.name: model-usage
skills.description: description: Use CodexBar CLI local cost usage to summarize per-model usage for Codex or Claude, including the current (most recent) model or a full model breakdown. Trigger when asked for model-level usage/cost data from codexbar, or when you need a scriptable per-model summary from codexbar cost JSON.

skills.name: nano-banana-pro
skills.description: name: nano-banana-pro

skills.name: nano-pdf
skills.description: description: Edit PDFs with natural-language instructions using the nano-pdf CLI.

skills.name: notion
skills.description: description: Notion API for creating and managing pages, databases, and blocks.

skills.name: obsidian
skills.description: description: Work with Obsidian vaults (plain Markdown notes) and automate via obsidian-cli.

skills.name: openai-image-gen
skills.description: name: openai-image-gen

skills.name: openai-whisper
skills.description: description: Local speech-to-text with the Whisper CLI (no API key).

skills.name: openai-whisper-api
skills.description: name: openai-whisper-api

skills.name: openhue
skills.description: description: Control Philips Hue lights/scenes via the OpenHue CLI.

skills.name: oracle
skills.description: description: Best practices for using the oracle CLI (prompt + file bundling, engines, sessions, and file attachment patterns).

skills.name: ordercli
skills.description: description: Foodora-only CLI for checking past orders and active order status (Deliveroo WIP).

skills.name: peekaboo
skills.description: description: Capture and automate macOS UI with the Peekaboo CLI.

skills.name: sag
skills.description: description: ElevenLabs text-to-speech with mac-style say UX.

skills.name: session-logs
skills.description: description: Search and analyze your own session logs (older/parent conversations) using jq.

skills.name: sherpa-onnx-tts
skills.description: name: sherpa-onnx-tts

skills.name: skill-creator
skills.description: description: Create or update AgentSkills. Use when designing, structuring, or packaging skills with scripts, references, and assets.

skills.name: slack
skills.description: description: Use when you need to control Slack from OpenClaw via the slack tool, including reacting to messages or pinning/unpinning items in Slack channels or DMs.

skills.name: songsee
skills.description: description: Generate spectrograms and feature-panel visualizations from audio with the songsee CLI.

skills.name: sonoscli
skills.description: description: Control Sonos speakers (discover/status/play/volume/group).

skills.name: spotify-player
skills.description: description: Terminal Spotify playback/search via spogo (preferred) or spotify_player.

skills.name: summarize
skills.description: description: Summarize or extract text/transcripts from URLs, podcasts, and local files (great fallback for “transcribe this YouTube/video”).

skills.name: things-mac
skills.description: description: Manage Things 3 via the `things` CLI on macOS (add/update projects+todos via URL scheme; read/search/list from the local Things database). Use when a user asks OpenClaw to add a task to Things, list inbox/today/upcoming, search tasks, or inspect projects/areas/tags.

skills.name: tmux
skills.description: description: Remote-control tmux sessions for interactive CLIs by sending keystrokes and scraping pane output.

skills.name: trello
skills.description: description: Manage Trello boards, lists, and cards via the Trello REST API.

skills.name: video-frames
skills.description: description: Extract frames or short clips from videos using ffmpeg.

skills.name: voice-call
skills.description: description: Start voice calls via the OpenClaw voice-call plugin.

skills.name: wacli
skills.description: description: Send WhatsApp messages to other people or search/sync WhatsApp history via the wacli CLI (not for normal user chats).

skills.name: weather
skills.description: description: Get current weather and forecasts (no API key required).
